cast.overview: One day a young woman named Blanca is saved by Xuan, a snake catcher from a nearby village. She has lost her memory, and together they go on a journey to discover her real identity, developing deeper feelings for one another along the way. But as they learn more about her past, they uncover a darker plot of supernatural forces vying for power, with the fate of the world hanging in the balance.
cast.title: White Snake

details.biography: Zheng Xiaopu is a mainland voice actor, graduated from the Central Academy of Drama in July 2007, majoring in broadcasting and hosting, and worked in Beijing Xingte Cultural Communication Co., Ltd., specializing in film and television dramas, cartoons, advertisements, special topics, and sound Dubbing
details.name: Zheng Xiaopu
